message: I propose we divide the money 7000 for me and 3000 for you. This way, I can keep a larger portion while still compensating you fairly.
I think a more even split is fair, considering the money will be worth less in the next round.  Let's go for 6000/4000.
Considering the inflation, I propose we divide the money 5200 for me and 4800 for you. This maintains a reasonable difference while accounting for the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
